entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: djay - DJ App & AI Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Access to PROï¼š$29.99 â†’ $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 *** Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly! djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. APPLE MUSIC INTEGRATION â€¢ Access to over 100 million songs â€¢ Match: recommendations based on the currently playing song â€¢ Your library: all your music seamlessly integrated â€¢ Listen Now and Charts integration â€¢ Discover new music and add songs to your Apple Music library right from within djay â€¢ Powerful search capabilities for the vast catalog of Apple Music ADVANCED MEDIA LIBRARY â€¢ Apple Music: 100+ million tracks, your personal library in the cloud (Apple Music subscription) â€¢ TIDAL: Millions of tracks, high quality sound (TIDAL DJ Extension) â€¢ SoundCloud: Millions of underground and premium tracks (SoundCloud Go+) â€¢ Beatport: Millions of electronic music tracks (Beatport Advanced Subscriptions) â€¢ Beatsource: Millions of open-format music tracks (Beatsource Subscription) â€¢ Files: access files in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), on your iOS device, or on external hard drives seamlessly â€¢ My Collection: Powerful playlists management AUTOMIX â€¢ Automatic, beat-matched mixes â€¢ Queue and Playlist automation NEURAL MIXâ„¢ â€¢ Isolate vocals, drums, and instrumentals in real-time (not supported with Apple Music) MUSIC PRODUCTION TOOLS â€¢ Sequencer: create beats on top of your music live â€¢ Looper: remix your music with up to 48 loops per track â€¢ Beat-matched sequencing of drums and samples â€¢ Extensive content library with hundreds of loops and samples. HARDWARE INTEGRATION â€¢ Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more â€¢ Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration â€¢ Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller â€¢ Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI â€¢ Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE â€¢ Ableton Link integration â€¢ Fluid Beatgrid â€¢ High-res waveforms BUILT FOR iOS â€¢ Accessible via VoiceOver â€¢ Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration â€¢ Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts â€¢ Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: â€¢ Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals â€¢ Neural Mixâ„¢ â€¢ Sampler & Looper â€¢ Automix â€¢ Crossfader FX â€¢ Video Mixing â€¢ Music Visualizers â€¢ Single Deck mode â€¢ 4-Deck mode â€¢ Advanced media library editing â€¢ Pre-cueing with headphones â€¢ Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces) â€¢ 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals. A supported streaming subscription and an internet connection are required to access songs from a streaming service in djay. No recording available for streamed songs. Neural Mix cannot be used when streaming from Apple Music. Specific songs may not be available or accessible on your account or in your country. Streaming service availability and pricing may vary depending on country, currency and service.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

7ï¼‰ã€å’Œå¹³ç²¾è‹±å…¨çƒæœã€å ¡å’ä¹‹å¤œã€fgoã€å½±ä¹‹è¯—ã€å¤±è½é¾™çº¦é»‘è‰²æ²™æ¼ ã€æ–‡æ˜é‡å¯å…¨çƒæœã€è’é‡ä¹±æ–—ã€ç‹‚é‡é£™è½¦9ç­‰æ¸¸æˆåŠ é€Ÿï¼æ¸¸æˆåº“åŒ…ç½—åƒæ¬¾å¥½ç©æ¸¸æˆï¼Œçƒ­æ¸¸æ–°æ¸¸æ’è¡Œä¸€ç›®äº†ç„¶ã€‚å¹³å‡æ¯å¤©3æ¬¾æ¸¸æˆçš„é€Ÿåº¦ä¸Šæ–°ã€‚Appå†…å¯ä»¥éšæ—¶æäº¤æƒ³ç©çš„æ¸¸æˆï¼Œä½ æƒ³ç©çš„æˆ‘ä»¬éƒ½æ”¯æŒï¼ entry.title: djay - DJ App & AI Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Full Access to PROï¼š$29.99 â†’ $6.99 [$6.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

*** Apple Design Award Winner 2024 *** Welcome to djay! The #1 DJ app and winner of multiple Apple Design Awards now integrates with Apple Music - mix over 100 million songs instantly! djay transforms your iOS device into a full-featured DJ system. Seamlessly integrated with your music library, djay allows you to mix your favorite songs and playlists. You can perform live, remix tracks, or enable Automix mode to let djay create a seamless mix for you automatically. Whether you are a professional DJ or a beginner who just loves to play with music, djay offers you the most intuitive yet powerful DJ experience on an iOS device. APPLE MUSIC INTEGRATION â€¢ Access to over 100 million songs â€¢ Match: recommendations based on the currently playing song â€¢ Your library: all your music seamlessly integrated â€¢ Listen Now and Charts integration â€¢ Discover new music and add songs to your Apple Music library right from within djay â€¢ Powerful search capabilities for the vast catalog of Apple Music ADVANCED MEDIA LIBRARY â€¢ Apple Music: 100+ million tracks, your personal library in the cloud (Apple Music subscription) â€¢ TIDAL: Millions of tracks, high quality sound (TIDAL DJ Extension) â€¢ SoundCloud: Millions of underground and premium tracks (SoundCloud Go+) â€¢ Beatport: Millions of electronic music tracks (Beatport Advanced Subscriptions) â€¢ Beatsource: Millions of open-format music tracks (Beatsource Subscription) â€¢ Files: access files in the cloud (e.g. Dropbox), on your iOS device, or on external hard drives seamlessly â€¢ My Collection: Powerful playlists management AUTOMIX â€¢ Automatic, beat-matched mixes â€¢ Queue and Playlist automation NEURAL MIXâ„¢ â€¢ Isolate vocals, drums, and instrumentals in real-time (not supported with Apple Music) MUSIC PRODUCTION TOOLS â€¢ Sequencer: create beats on top of your music live â€¢ Looper: remix your music with up to 48 loops per track â€¢ Beat-matched sequencing of drums and samples â€¢ Extensive content library with hundreds of loops and samples. HARDWARE INTEGRATION â€¢ Plug-and-play integration with over 100 MIDI controllers by Pioneer DJ, Reloop, Hercules, Numark, Denon DJ, and more â€¢ Digital Vinyl System (DVS) Integration â€¢ Advanced MIDI Learn to map any class-compliant MIDI controller â€¢ Support for Bluetooth audio and MIDI â€¢ Support for multi-channel USB audio interfaces and video output POWERFUL AUDIO ENGINE â€¢ Ableton Link integration â€¢ Fluid Beatgrid â€¢ High-res waveforms BUILT FOR iOS â€¢ Accessible via VoiceOver â€¢ Airplay, Live Photos, Apple Watch, and iCloud integration â€¢ Haptic Feedback, Drag & Drop, Keyboard Shortcuts â€¢ Multi-Tasking: Slide Over and Split View support Top features of the optional Pro subscription include: â€¢ Unlimited access to an extensive library of samples, loops, FX, and visuals â€¢ Neural Mixâ„¢ â€¢ Sampler & Looper â€¢ Automix â€¢ Crossfader FX â€¢ Video Mixing â€¢ Music Visualizers â€¢ Single Deck mode â€¢ 4-Deck mode â€¢ Advanced media library editing â€¢ Pre-cueing with headphones â€¢ Hardware integration (MIDI controllers, DVS, multi-channel audio interfaces) â€¢ 7-day free trial: free access to all djay Pro content and features for one week, cancel anytime The optional PRO subscription allows you to subscribe once and use djay Pro across all your Mac and iOS devices, including access to all PRO features, as well as 1000+ loops, samples, and visuals. A supported streaming subscription and an internet connection are required to access songs from a streaming service in djay. No recording available for streamed songs. Neural Mix cannot be used when streaming from Apple Music. Specific songs may not be available or accessible on your account or in your country. Streaming service availability and pricing may vary depending on country, currency and service.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Audio Editor & Music Mixer
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Permanent membershipï¼š$14.99 â†’ $11.99 [$11.99 ~ $14.99]

Application Description

Want to make your own unique phone ringtones? Or want to combine multiple songs and synthesize the music you want? Or want to know the effect of mixing different songs? Audio Editor & Music Mixer is an easy to operate music cutting and mixing tool. Simple and excellent, functional and practical! Whether you are a professional musician or music amateur, you can play easily. Features: 1.Professional ringtone clip: free to edit, the maximum clipping of the ringtone is 40s (in line with the characteristics of ringtones) 2.Simple music stitching: song editing and splicing as a whole,connect the favorite songs 3.Unique music mixing: free to cut the two songs, mixed together to play, feel different music effects! Subscription instrutionsï¼š - After you subscribe to the VIP, you have unlimited access to all features - Subscribe to provide 4 types of VIP services, including: weekly VIP service, monthly VIP service, yearly VIP service, permanent VIP service - Subscribe to $2.49 per week, $4.49 per month, $13.49 for 1 year and $14.99 for permanent - The purchase process is to deduct the purchase amount from the iTunes account - Account will be charged at the cost of the selected package within 24 hours prior to the current period - Cancellation of current subscription is not allowed during active subscription period.But you can cancel next subscription. - You can access our privacy policy by visiting (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/privacy_policy/musicmixer_en.html - You can access (long press) https://www.camoryapps.com/netpower/service/musicmixer_en.html to read the Terms of Service *The price is equivalent to the 'Apple App Store Matrix' which is equivalent to the subscription price in US dollars.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Annual VIPï¼š$84.99 â†’ $39.99 [$39.99 ~ $84.99]

Application Description

QuickFox is a high-quality accelerator specially created for overseas Chinese and students. It is a accelerator for overseas Chinese to watch TV dramas, listen to songs, play games, live events, business offices, futures and stock trading, etc. It has now provided high-quality return acceleration services to millions of overseas Chinese students around the world. It is one-click direct connection, stable and easy to use, and is the first choice for overseas Chinese around the world to accelerate their links to China. Please note: This product is only available to overseas users. Users in mainland China cannot use this product service normally, please download with caution. ã€QuickFox main functionsã€‘ *Connect to the domestic network with one click, and visit domestic applications and web pages with low latency. *Reduced latency for Chinese server games: various popular Chinese server games such as Honor of Kings, Identity V, Peace Elite, Eggboy Party, DNF, Genshin Impact, Steam, etc. have stable connections and ultra-low latency. - Covering global dedicated servers, high-speed connection with low latency fluctuations, stable switching and continuous connection. - One account can be switched seamlessly, and multiple devices can be logged in at the same time, making it convenient and fast. [QuickFox technical advantages] *High-speed dedicated server. *Global nodes, stable acceleration. *High-level encryption, privacy guaranteed. [Continuous monthly membership] 1. Benefits: accelerated advertising-free, exclusive super VIP member servers, etc. 2. 1-month subscription. 3. Subscription price: Continuous monthly subscription for RMB 40 4. Payment: Credited to the iTunes account after payment 5. Cancel renewal: Manually turn off the automatic renewal function in iTunes/Apple ID settings within 24 hours before the current subscription period expires. 6. Renewal: Apple's iTunes account will be deducted within 24 hours before expiration. After the deduction is successful, the subscription period will be extended by one subscription period. 7. Privacy Policy: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/agreement 8. Continuous monthly membership service agreement: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/monthlyVipAgreement 9. VIP Service Agreement: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/memberServiceAgreement 10. Terms of Service: https://inside.quickfox.com.cn/clause ============================ Email: info@quickfox.com.cn WeChat public account: QuickFox ============================

entry.title: Cleaner One Pro - Uninstaller
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Unlock Full Versionï¼š$29.99 â†’ $19.99 [$19.99 ~ $29.99]

Application Description

Cleaner One Pro is the all-in-one Mac Master Cleaner App. It can optimize your disk usage, free up space on your Mac, keep the hard drive clean, remove duplicate photos and other files, manage your apps, and much more. Fully compatible with macOS Monterey and Apple Silicon. PRIMARY FEATURES [Junk Files Cleaner] â€¢ Has Quick Disk Clean feature you can click from the Status Bar Menu â€¢ Clean temporary files, including logs, mail caches, iTunes and iOS temporary files, etc. Empty Trash for current user â€¢ Detect remaining files after deleting Apps â€¢ Clean Junk Files in removable storage on your Mac [Duplicate File Scanner] â€¢ Thorough and quick scan â€” fast and accurate scanning technique covers your entire home folder â€¢ Smart and Accurate Filter â€” duplicates are selected not only by file name but also by their content. Files are shown in detailed preview. Click the Auto Select button to help you decide which copy you wish to delete. â€¢ Easy and safe decision â€” duplicates can be sorted by file type and listed in their full route for you to track. You can decide which way to clean these files; either by sending them to Trash or deleting them permanently (In-App Purchase required) [Photo Manager] â€¢ Quickly find similar photos, blurry photos, and screenshots â€¢ Preview photos in groups after scanning â€¢ Organize your photo library â€¢ Easily remove photos that may be safe to delete to free up space (In-App Purchase required) [Intelligent App Manager] â€¢ Auto-clean leftovers of deleted Apps â€¢ Manage all installed applications with the All-in-One App Optimizer â€¢ Detect and remove leftover files of deleted apps with the App Manager â€¢ List all the applications installed on your Mac by name, size, and last opened date â€¢ Remove unwanted applications with Mac Disk Clean (In-App Purchase required) â€¢ Remove all the associated files of uninstalled applications (In-App Purchase required) â€¢ Added Vulnerability Scan in the App Manager to enhance security (In-App Purchase required) [Big Files Scanner] â€¢ 1-click scan of big files (customizable size from 10 MB and above) â€¢ Multiple filters of size, date, name and type â€¢ Local files in sync with your cloud drives can also be found * Important big files can be ""locked"" into the protected list to avoid accidental deletion [Mac Disk Clean Map] â€¢ Mac Disk Clean scans all your disk drives and creates a clickable map of the files on your disk, color-coded by type â€¢ Provides additional information about files when you click on an item on the map â€¢ View your entire disk by file or folder size to determine which files or folders use the most space with Clean Master [Real-Time System Status] â€¢ Real-time network usage â€¢ Real-time CPU usage â€¢ See detailed network and CPU information (In-App Purchase required) The paid version costs as little as $19.99 per year (this price may vary by location). Subscriptions will auto-renew unless canceled. â€” Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€” Subscription may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the userâ€™s Account Setting after purchase. â€” No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period. â€” Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. â€” Your account will be charged for renewal for the amount of your current subscription within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. All cost for subscriptions are mentioned above. Privacy Policy and Terms of Use Privacy Policy: http://gr.trendmicro.com/GREntry/NonPayment?Target=TrendCleaner&OS=&SP=&PID=TCS60&FunID=PrivacyPolicy&VID=&Locale=en Terms of Use: http://gr.trendmicro.com/GREntry/NonPayment?Target=TrendCleaner&OS=&SP=&PID=TCS60&FunID=EULA&VID=&Locale=en Please comment in the App Store and you can also email us directly at mac_support@trendmicro.com.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: SQLPro Studio
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • SQLPro Premiumï¼š$99.99 â†’ $15.99 [$15.99 ~ $99.99]

Application Description

SQLPro Studio is the premium database management tool for Postgres, MySQL, Microsoft Management Studio and Oracle databases. Some of the great features include: + Intellisense/SQL autocompletion. + Syntax highlighting with customizable themes (including dark). + Tabbed based interface for an optimal user experience. + Context aware database tree navigation, including quick access to tables, views, columns, indexes and much more! + SQL Beautifier/formatter. + Database wide searching. + NTLMv2 supported (but not required). + Netbios support. + Master password support for additional security. + Supports Handoff from iOS to macOS. SQLPro Studio supports the following database servers: + MySQL & MariaDB + PostgreSQL + Microsoft SQL Server (2005 and above) + SnowflakeDB + SQLite + Oracle (8i and above) Privacy Policy: https://hankinsoft.com/privacypolicy.html Terms of Use: https://hankinsoft.com/termsofuse.html Price: SQLPro offers Premium subscriptions (or a single Lifetime purchase) in order to interact with database result sets. Premium subscriptions are available as either a Monthly, or a Yearly duration. Subscriptions auto-renew within 24 hours of the expiration date unless auto-renewal is turned off in the iTunes account settings. Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.

Application Screenshot

iPhone
